ruleContent.content:
<js>
let html = result;
let jsUrl = html.match(/<script[^>]+src="(https:\/\/js\.8xsk\.org\/[^"]+)"/)?.[1];

let jsCode = java.ajax(jsUrl);

let raw = jsCode.match(/document\.write\((.+?)\);/)?.[1];

if (!raw) {
  result = "未找到正文内容";
} else {
  raw = raw.replace(/^['"]|['"]$/g, "");  // 去掉引号

  let text;
  try {
    text = decodeURIComponent(unescape(raw));  // 解码中文
  } catch (e) {
    text = raw;
  }

  // 清洗 HTML 标签
  text = text.replace(/<br\s*\/?>/gi, "\n").replace(/<[^>]+>/g, "");

  result = text.trim();  // 设置 result 为正文
}
</js>
